description.en-US:
Description A list manager to not forget the milk anymore. The app can manage multiple lists. To add a list tap on the top left corner, type the list name and clic the '+' button, or hit ENTER. Once the list is created add items to the list with the input on top of the page. Each item can be checked as 'done' or deleted with the buttons on the same line. If an item name is too long, tap on it to display. Open the toolbar at the bottom of the page to manage the active list items (edit names, change position, delete items) or the lists (edit list name, change list position). To change lists and items position: first click on the blue button near a list/item; then click on a different list/item to swap them. All changes are saved only after the 'OK' button is pressed (the top right corner). Settings Choose the font size that best fit your device. Available options are: 8px, 12px, 16px, 20px, 24px. If none of these fit your needs contact us via email. Choose your favourite font family. Available options are: MozTT, Sans serif, Serif, Monospace. Choose if delete an item when it's done or just check it as 'done' for future use. You can still delete an item after it's checked as 'done'. Choose if move items checked as 'done' at the bottom of the list or not. Choose your favourite color scheme. All changes are saved only after the 'OK' button is pressed (the top right corner). Work in progress... v3.0 is in beta test!
  • Specific settings for each list: settings will become general settings, that is a new list is created with that set of options
  • Choose if order items alphabetically
  • Minor graphical adjustments
  • Suggest items that are already in list and marked as 'done' (Why? Because in a long list it can be simplier to toggle 'done' flag by typing the item name instead of search it). It can be enabled/disabled in settings.
  • In the drawer you will see for each list the 'number of items to do' over 'total items'. If all items are 'to do' or 'done settings' is not active you will see only the total number of items
  • Minor bug fix
For suggestions and bug report please send an email and/or comment the app... Can you help us translating this app? Please send an email and specify in which language you want to translate. Actually languages available for translation are: de_DE, en_US, es_ES, fr_FR, pt_PT. For different languages please specify the language code. Thanks for rating!

release_notes.en-US:
• List items and list titles can be edited
  • List position and item position can be modified
  • User can choose a color scheme
  • Minor bug corrected
